text: Benito Joanet Giménez (16 September 1935 – 22 March 2020) was a Spanish football player and manager. == Career as a player == Born in the Esplugues de Llobregat, Joanet played as goalkeeper for Espanyol, Real Zaragoza, Terrassa, Europa and Deportivo de La Coruña. == Coaching career == He became a football manager after he stopped playing. He was a manager for Hércules, Castellón, Antequerano, Cádiz, Mallorca, Tenerife, Espanyol, Salamanca and Las Palmas. == Death == Joanet died in Alicante on 22 March 2020 from COVID-19, during the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain.Fallece Benito Joanet, víctima del coronavirus == References == Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish association football goalkeepers Category:Spanish football managers Category:Footballers from Catalonia Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain Category:CD Tenerife managers Category:CD Castellón managers
title: Benito Joanet
